text:
GraphHopper | Cloud Engineer | Munich, Germany | REMOTE possible, contract based

GraphHopper is the driver behind the popular open source projects GraphHopper Routing Engine and GraphHopper jsprit using open data like OpenStreetMap. On top of these projects we built the GraphHopper Directions API and now look to improve our architecture (bare metal & cloud mix with docker, kubernetes etc) with your help.

For more information please see https://www.graphhopper.com/jobs/
